item.description: Enjoy a delicious brunch in the company of friendly folk at EVOO (for this occasion only, they're opening on this particular Sunday) as well as support The Greater Boston Food Bank (GBFB) http://www.gbfb.org/S.... The $35 per person cost includes three courses (anything from the bar is extra) which is quite a bargain. EVOO http://evoorestaurant... will donate 100% of the $35 cost to the GBFB. Support an important charity and enjoy a great meal with good folk.

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Super Hunger Brunch at EVOO
